author: agemanning
content:
Are we still looking at doing releases today to 5.1 for medalla? 
I'm going to update LH medalla bootnodes to 5.1 and run a few test nodes. Will make a release if we are still planning on going ahead. 
LH may still validate ENR's it gets from cat-dog and they may fail validation. But if there is a cat-dog bootnode server up I can add into the LH release for nodes to connect to. So maybe 5.0 nodes will try to connect to the 5.1 peers.

author: nishant0
content: We have a 5.1 catdog bootnode up and running but i dont think we will make a release with it just yet

author: nishant0
content: Given the lack of finality maybe pushing v5.1 at this time might not be the best

author: protolambda
content: <@!476250636548308992> running the latest version? Let me know if there is anything to change

author: nishant0
content: Ah no i actually have to still bump it up to latest. Will get to it by today. We will most likely merge v5.1 to master by today/tommorrow and it comes up in next weeks release. So there will still be a some users running v5.1 before next weeks release

author: nishant0
content: <@!498009160982724610> I just discussed this with preston again and we might include it in our next release. We just need to get additional bootnodes up and verify running with catdog works for us in its latest release. If its all good we can tag  a new release with v5.1 . Do you have a lighthouse v5.1 bootnode up and running ?

author: agemanning
content: No, was just waiting on consensus before updating and merging code down

author: agemanning
content: I'll spin one up for some tests

author: agemanning
content: Is your next release order of hours or order of days?

author: nishant0
content: most likely days(tomorrow or the day after)
